scripts.init: npm i && npm i --prefix ./functions && npm i --prefix ./site
scripts.fire:build:functions: npm run lint --prefix ./functions && npm run build --prefix ./functions
scripts.fire:build: npm run fire:build:functions && npm run fire:build:ssr
scripts.fire:build:serve: npm run fire:build && npm run fire:serve
scripts.fire:build:deploy: npm run fire:build && npm run fire:deploy
